## createPolicy() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates a new policy builder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createPolicy(name: string, defaultReleaseType: ReleaseType): PolicyBuilder;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

name


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Human-readable name for the policy


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

defaultReleaseType


</td><td>

[ReleaseType](./change-detector-core.releasetype.md)


</td><td>

Release type when no rule matches


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[PolicyBuilder](./change-detector-core.policybuilder.md)

## Example


```ts
const policy = createPolicy('semver-strict', 'major')
  .addRule(rule('removal').action('removed').returns('major'))
  .addRule(rule('addition').action('added').returns('minor'))
  .build();
```
